home.title: Azodoz 3: Revolutionary Material of the Future
home.subtitle: A Breakthrough in 21st Century Materials Science
home.description: Azodoz 3 is a synthetic material that has become a true breakthrough in materials science due to its exceptional physical and chemical properties.

about.title: The Story of Azodoz 3
about.intro: Azodoz 3 was synthesized by a visionary scientist whose name remains outside historical chronicles, but whose achievements are already shaping the future.
about.missionText: Our mission is to revolutionize materials science and open new horizons for humanity with Azodoz 3.

properties.title: Unique Properties of Azodoz 3
properties.intro: Azodoz 3 possesses a set of properties that distinguish it among all known materials.
properties.thermalStabilityDescription: Ideal for use in space vacuum
properties.corrosionResistanceDescription: Even in the most aggressive environments

applications.title: Applications of Azodoz 3
applications.intro: The unique characteristics of Azodoz 3 open up wide possibilities for its use in various fields.
applications.constructionDescription: Azodoz 3 has already proven its effectiveness in creating super-strong and lightweight structures, such as a lunar shelter 50 km below the Moon's surface.
applications.medicineDescription: The material is used to create implants, such as 'Titan-3', which integrate into the human body, significantly increasing physical capabilities.
applications.spaceDescription: Azodoz 3 has become the foundation for building next-generation spacecraft capable of transporting 350 trillion tons of material with minimal energy expenditure.
applications.energyDescription: The material is used in the development of hyper-energy crystals that provide unprecedented energy storage density.

research.title: Research and Future Prospects
research.intro: Azodoz 3 has potential that has yet to be fully realized.
research.interstellarTravelDescription: With Azodoz 3, it is possible to create spacecraft capable of reaching distant exoplanets, such as HD 100546 b, located 356 light-years from Earth.
research.planetColonizationDescription: Azodoz 3 can become the foundation for building self-sufficient colonies on Mars, Europa, or even more distant celestial bodies.
research.humanEnhancementDescription: Further development of biomedical technologies based on Azodoz 3 may lead to the creation of humans adapted to life in space or on planets with harsh conditions.
